Translations.Text: Yakhana tara tamra grhe agamana karala ebam balalah salama. Tini balalenah amara tomadera byapare bhita.
Tara balalah bhaya karabena na. Amara apanake ekajana jnanabana chele-santanera susambada dicchi.
Tini balalenah tomara ki amake ematabasthaya susambada diccha, yakhana ami bardhakye pauche gechi
Tara balalah amara apanake satya su-sambada dicchi! Ata'eba apani nirasa habena na.
Tini balalenah palanakartara rahamata theke pathabhrastara chara ke nirasa haya
tini balalenah atahpara tomadera pradhana uddesya ki he allahara preritagana
tara balalah amara ekati aparadhi sampradayera prati prerita hayechi.
Kintu lutera paribara-parijana. Amara abasya'i tadera saba'ike bamciye neba.
Tabe tara stri. Amara sthira karechi ye, se theke ya'oyadera dalabhukta habe.
Atahpara yakhana preritara lutera grhe pauchala.
Tini balalenah tomara to aparicita loka.
Tara balalah na baram amara apanara kache ai bastu niye esechi, ye samparke tara bibada karata.
Ebam amara apanara kache satya bisaya niye esechi ebam amara satyabadi.

Ata'eba apani sesaratre paribarera sakalake niye cale yana ebam apani tadera pascadanusarana karabena na ebam apanadera madhye ke'u yena pichana phire na dekhe. Apanara yekhane adesa prapta hacchena sekhane yana.
Ami lutake e bisaya parijnata kare de'i ye, sakala hale'i taderake samule binasa kare deya habe.
Luta balalenah tara amara mehamana. Ata'eba amake lanchita karo na.
Tomara allahake bhaya kara ebam amara iyayata nasta karo na.
Tara balalah amara ki apanake jagatdbasira samarthana karate nisedha karini.
